name: Overwhelm: Divine Intervention
description:
Evil forces from the Underworld have band together to swarm the surface world and overtake the living!

You control the chosen heroes~

Ehecatl of the Aztecs

Argos of the Greeks

and Ashai of the Egyptians

Annihilate those who dare to disrupt the natural order!

Download Instructions:

Download the file below and unzip it, then run the file "FILE NAME HERE". This should load the game. If this does not work, please email acf63@case.edu.

NOTE: This is a student project made of a group of college students for a game design class within the span of 3 months. As a result, the game is more of a prototype than an actual game. Please keep this in mind as you play. Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated, as we are still learning. Thanks!
